Did you have System.out debugging turned on while running in a runtime 
workbencg or was this the contents of your log file?

Please provide steps to recreate as it worksforme -- I successfully uploaded 
multi-megabyte files.  Maybe something about the files you used.

One case where this might happen is if the server said that it was going to 
use chunked streams but it didn't? This would be surprising though since that 
is done by the http server itself.

Investigate:
- is it possible that we got confused with the "is using chunked" value?
- catch the NumberFormatException and improve error reporting to the user

Build 20020610.

Cannot reproduce the failure (using the same data and a different server).
I've added a handler to map any NumberFormatException to an IOException so that 
the higher-level exception handlers report the problem in a friendly fashion.

I'm resolving it for now, but will reopen it given a reproduceable failure case.
